text: Sir Malcolm Rognvald Innes of Edingight (25 May 1938 - 20 September 2020) was a Scottish civil servant. He was the Lord Lyon King of Arms of Scotland from 1981 until 2001. He was born in Edinburgh. He was appointed a Writer to the Signet in 1964. Following his retirement in 2001, he was appointed Orkney Herald of Arms Extraordinary. He was a co-founder of the Heraldry Society of Scotland. He died on 20 September 2020 at the age of 82 from cancer.The Court of the Lord Lyon ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from cancer Category:Politicians from Edinburgh
title: Malcolm Innes of Edingight
